dataset module#

dataset.load_cpu()[source]#
dataset.load_creditcard()[source]#
dataset.load_dataset(name: str)[source]#

Load a default dataset.

Parameters:

name – One of 'cpu', 'credit card', 'diabetes', 'flower', 'mnist', 'phoneme', 'pol', 'wind'

Returns:

A tuple (X, y) containing the features and labels of the loaded dataset

Raises:

ValueError – If name is not one of the above names
